thread.title: Fear of Buhari: Nigeria elite on best behaviour over graft crackdown
thread.title_full: Fear of Buhari: Nigeria elite on best behaviour over graft crackdown | News24

author: news24.com
title: Fear of Buhari: Nigeria elite on best behaviour over graft crackdown
text:
Lagos - Business is slow at the moment for Benedict Okafor, who sells luxury cars from a lot near the port in Nigeria's financial capital, Lagos.
In the capital, Abuja, 535km away, the property market seems to be in a rut, with the habitual buyers - the moneyed elite - staying away.
"I normally sold five cars every month before" President Muhammadu Buhari came to power, said Okafor. "But in the past four months I have sold only one Toyota car.
"I guess rich people are scared."
